hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Test Name in RoadRunner. app.component.type.env.misc

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CT_COMPOSITION_FULL_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the full path to your composition in CloudTest.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VUSER_COUNT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
This is the number of Virtual Users to be executed in your test.
For this to work, customproperty="./NUM_VUSERS=${VUSER_COUNT}" must be set under Additional Properties for SOASTA's Play Compositions section below. You also need to have a custom variable of NUM_VUSERS set in your Composition that maps to the vuser count.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RUN_DURATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Time in milliseconds to run test. Default 10 minutes.
For this to work, customproperty="./RUN_DURATION=${RUN_DURATION}" must be set under Additional Properties for SOASTA's Play Compositions section below. You also need to have a custom variable of RUN_DURATION set in your Composition that maps to the run time.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ENVIRONMENT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Tracked in RoadRunner. This is important for trending as RoadRunner includes the environment when trending.
This field can also be used to replace the subdomain of a target in a test clip.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HOST_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This field can be used to override the target host name in a clip. This assumes you already have the function at the top of your clip to use this variable.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RAMP_VUSER_START_DELAY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Time in milliseconds for each vuser to start. Default 1 second (1000ms).
For this to work, customproperty="./RAMP_VUSER_START_DELAY=${RAMP_VUSER_START_DELAY}" must be set under Additional Properties for SOASTA's Play Compositions section below. You also need to have a custom variable of RAMP_VUSER_START_DELAY set in your Composition that maps to the start ramp.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RAMP_VUSER_END_DELAY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Time in milliseconds for each vuser to stop. Default 1 second (1000ms).
For this to work, customproperty="./RAMP_VUSER_END_DELAY=${RAMP_VUSER_END_DELAY}" must be set under Additional Properties for SOASTA's Play Compositions section below. You also need to have a custom variable of RAMP_VUSER_END_DELAY set in your Composition that maps to the end ramp.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_DATA_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Very important for getting your data into RoadRunner. This has two options. If your test is just messages, use "resultclipelementdetails". If it's all containers like pages and transactions, then use "resultcollectiondetails". Make sure one of these checkboxes is checked in your CloudTest scenario.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SLA_GROUP_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the SLA Group Id value that you can create using the API or in the RoadRunner application. This SLA group id will map your test to a group of SLAs to enable SLAs in the RoadRunner application.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_SUB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will be used for additional grouping in RoadRunner.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: !SECTION_END
